comments: There is undeniably an aura about Prof. Simpson- he\'s capable of effortlessly gaining your full attention and keeps your interest by encouraging discussions. If his aim was to deepen my love for Philosophy, it\'s accomplished- I buy more Philosophy books than I need to and I\'ll never get enough. His class should be recommended to all undergraduates

OH MY GOD. He is super hot and he is super smart. Philosophy can be boring, but looking at him for 2 hours is paradise. If you are a girl or a woman, or a guy men, you MUST take this teacher. Plus, he knows he stuff.

Prof. Simpson\'s ethics classes were the most interesting lectures I\'ve attended throughout my college years. He\'s an extremely knowledgeable teacher with a great personality, smile and... I\'d take his classes again and again if I could...
No one would ever come to this class if Mark Simpson wasn\'t the TA..He is very attractive, but his intellect and clarity is what made this class as easy and convenient as it was.
Mark Simpson is a king among men.

Mark Simpson is a GREAT teacher. He is a really cool guy. He is very clear about what he expects from students. We had two papers, a midterm and a final. Not difficult at all. Oh and he is super HOT!!!! He deserves 5 chili peppers..lol. Some of the readings are tedious but worth it. Class was interesting and enjoyable-cutest teacher ever=)
